name: prueba CI 

# Se ejecuta en cada push o pull request a la rama main
on:
  push:

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - name: Setup java
        uses: actions/java@v3
        whit:
            java-version: '21'
      - name: compile 
        uses: javac src/*.java
      - name: run program
      - uses: src/*.java
